attributes.action: Increase the taxation on the non-essential use of road vehicles, while allowing a reasonable amount of 'free' usage per month. To increase by a proportionate scale the road tax amount levied on the most fuel-inefficient vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increase the taxation on the non-essential use of road vehicles, while allowing a reasonable amount of 'free' usage per month. This 'free' usage to be greater for rural transport users. To increase by a proportionate scale the road tax amount levied on the most fuel-inefficient vehicles, to use this market mechanism, commensurate with  a free society, to allow for an improved and healthier environment for all our citizens, to allow us to meet our EU CO2 targets and NOT have the taxation that will otherwise be imposed on us. To implement satellite transponder technology to fulfill this measure

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
